topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c8c2466368727ffecf0500#post_53c8c2466368727ffecf0500

"@Meresflut":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53c8c408636872500e790000#post_53c8c408636872500e790000
if it makes you feel better hunting is in almost every way better for the hunted animals.
1) Hunters tend to be very concerned with conservationism and take time and money to make sure these animals can live better. This human intervention generally boosts their populations. 
And poaching is punished.
2) Dying from a bullet is better than a predator.
topics.author: 4fe16df67f123b13e400003f
